name: Chicken Caesar Pasta Salad Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: farfalle pasta, chicken, olive oil, salt, pepper, romaine lettuce, grape tomatoes, crouton, parmesan cheese, caesar dressing
recipeIngredient: 2 heads romaine lettuce, cut in 1-2 inch pieces
1 cup grape Tomatoes, cut in half
recipeInstructionSteps: Boil water, add the pasta, and cook according to package instructions. Drain water, and let the pasta chill.
Meanwhile, season each of the chicken breasts with 1 Tbsp. olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill for six to eight minutes on each side. Cut the chicken into bite-size pieces.
In a large bowl combine pasta, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, chicken, croutons, parmesan, and Caesar dressing. Toss gently.
